message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $11,000?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we discuss $10,500?
I understand you're firm on the price, Alice.  While $10,500 is closer to what I had in mind, I'm trying to stay closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to do $9,750?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $10,200?
